events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been categorized under refund based on the customer's request for returning the incorrect item.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request and follow up with the customer.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can proceed with your refund?
Here is my order number 123456 and attached is the photo of the item that arrived, which is different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund immediately and send you a prepaid label to return the wrong item.
Thank you for the quick response and help. I appreciate the refund and return label being arranged so fast.
Your refund has been processed and you should receive a confirmation email shortly. Please use the return label to send back the incorrect item.
Just following up to confirm you received the refund and that the return process is going smoothly. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
We are closing this case as the refund was successfully completed and the customer has confirmed satisfaction with the resolution.
